value:
$WmMPID_レベッカ,ch03_13_Rebacca_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Hi there! So I hate to break it to you,
but, um, there's this contract, see?$k$pAnd the darn thing says we have
to fight you now. But I think if you
prove you're powerful...$k$pThat will make everything right
as rain again. So try your best to
beat us, all right?$k$p$WmMPID_カレル,ch03_14_Karel_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Silly girl! Never speak for me,
though I also demand they fight
no less than their best.$k$pMy sword is my life. I long to cut
down the strong. This contract
changes nothing for me.$k$pWe will fight, and I will win. It's as
simple as that.$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ニニアン,ch03_16_Ninian_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You have revealed the true measure
of your power, and you are strong
indeed.$k$pI give you my thanks. Now I can
return...back to Lord Eliwood...
back to Lady Lyndis.$k$pIf ever we meet again... And will we,
I wonder? Then I will dance for you
a dance of gratitude.$k$Sbs150|
